title: Divya Raga Ruby Diamond Set: A Modern Take on Traditional Haaram
materials: 22K Gold (Huṇḍi Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Embellished with high-quality
pear-shaped rubies and brilliant-cut diamonds (VVS clarity). Jhumka features a genuine South Sea pearl.
features: This exquisite set features a modern floral Haaram design interlinked with intricate, heart-shaped motifs. The matching Jhumkas showcase a dome shape adorned with diamonds and hearts, culminating in a luminous South Sea pearl. The necklace's floral design uses the pachi setting to highlight the gemstones. The lightweight mesh chain ensures comfortable wear.
colors: Rich gold tone with vibrant ruby red and sparkling white diamonds. The South Sea pearl adds a touch of creamy iridescence.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for modern formal events and celebrations.
description: This set beautifully blends traditional Telugu jewelry elements with a modern aesthetic. The use of genuine rubies and diamonds adds significant value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. This set is a statement piece that will be treasured for generations, making it a perfect heirloom (bhāratīya parampara).
